Title: Relates to creating an action for the recovery of damages for personal injury caused by exposure to toxic burn pits while serving as a member of the armed forces
Summary: Relates to creating an action for the recovery of damages for personal injury caused by exposure to toxic burn pits while serving as a member of the armed forces on or after August 2, 1990.
LawCode: Add ยง214-i, amd ยง214, CPLR
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the civil practice law and rules, in relation to creating an action for the recovery of damages for personal injury caused by exposure to toxic burn pits while serving as a member of the armed forces
